title: Average ticket price of the New Orleans Saints 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2014 to 2010.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2019 to 2016.
But, the next significant trend is moderately neutral which exists from 2016 to 2014.
But, the next significant trend is extremely neutral which exists from 2010 to 2008.
But, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2008 to 2006.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for New Orleans Saints games in the National Football League from 2006 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average ticket price was at 97.72 U.S. dollars .
